work.position: Software Engineering Intern, Financial Resource Management Team
work.summary: Two Sigma, through its use of algorithms and with its unique culture, drives transformations in many industries including investment management and insurance.
highlights: Expanded a data processing pipeline written in Python
Collaborated with a team using JIRA, GitLab issues, remote and local meetings
Independently built a profiling tool to enhance team productivity

work.summary: Oak Ridge National Laboratory is the largest US Department of Energy science and energy laboratory, conducting basic and applied research to deliver transformative solutions to compelling problems in energy and security.
highlights: Developed an analysis pipeline for simulated proteins
Designed software to elegantly handle memory limitations with parallelism and memory mapped data
Balanced a 10-15 (40+ in summer) hour work week and independently met project deadlines during school

work.position: Software Engineering Intern, Software Integration Workflows Team
work.summary: Two Sigma, through its use of algorithms and with its unique culture, drives transformations in many industries including investment management and insurance.
highlights: Extended the Bazel build system to leverage existing company infrastructure
Implemented POSIX extended attribute support in a legacy (8 years old) FUSE filesystem
Presented on work at BazelCon2018, video available at https://youtu.be/rQd9Zd1ONOw

activities.summary: Competitive Ultimate team with 7+ hours of practice per week.

highlights: Organizing workshops and developing content for teaching data science & machine learning

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
